name: Slender Zombies: Walking World
description:
Slender Zombies: Walking World brings the zombie apocalypse to your phone!
Become a survivor, pick your weapon and explore the world. Run from the walkers and never look back!

Glenn Dixon was the sheriff of a small city when the apocalypse begun. One day he was at the office and when he was leaving BUM, zombies everywhere.
So Glenn Dixon started looking for other survivors and provisions and a few weeks later he was with a group of people trying to survive the walkers. And Glenn Dixon was the best survivor so he became the leader.
Walkers is how Glenn Dixon call zombies. And that is how you will call them too, because you're a survivor... and because it sounds cool.

Run through the streets and try to be the best survivor in the cemetery... I mean in the global leaderboards. Compete against your friends to see how many walkers you can hunt!

The streets are full of obstacles and zombies you should dodge. Go as fast as you can and collect all the brains. Don't get too close to the cemetery! Sounds obvious but.. the cemetery is full of zombies. Just saying.
Use power-ups to cheat death. Use brains to upgrade the power-ups.

* Dash and dodge as fast as you can!
* Swipe to do awesome jumps, slides, tricks and more!
* Online leaderboards and achievements!
* Survivors vs zombies! The apocalypse! Sounds like fun!

Zombie apocalypse games had never been so fun! Camping in the cemetery tonight... yaaay!
